edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.localnameserver.nodeconfig

Class LNSConsistentReconfigurableNodeConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.localnameserver.nodeconfig.LNSConsistentNodeConfig
      • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.localnameserver.nodeconfig.LNSConsistentReconfigurableNodeConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GNSInterfaceNodeConfig<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.nio.interfaces.NodeConfig<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.nio.interfaces.Stringifiable<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ModifiableActiveConfig<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ModifiableRCConfig<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ReconfigurableNodeConfig<InetSocketAddress>

    public class LNSConsistentReconfigurableNodeConfig
extends LNSConsistentNodeConfig
implements edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ModifiableActiveConfig<InetSocketAddress>, edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.interfaces.ModifiableRCConfig<InetSocketAddress>
    This class is a wrapper around NodeConfig to ensure that it is consistent, i.e., it returns consistent results even if it changes midway. In particular, it does not allow the use of a method like getNodeIDs(). It also has consistent hashing utility methods.
